channel.title: How to add an ::info command with text window
channel.description:
its delta source and i searched but couldnt find how to add a command like ::info with a text window
the only thing i found while searchign was this http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,349792.0.html but it doesnt really help me in my case
thx in advance

item.title: How to add an ::info command with text window
item.dc:creator: @FinalFantasy FinalFantasy
item.description:
@FinalFantasy wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("info")) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@Server Info", 8144); //Title sendQuest("Scrol down, there are more Commands..", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("::food", 8148); sendQuest("::suggest", 8149); sendQuest("::players.", 8150); sendQuest("::alchs", 8151); sendQuest("Pjing is strictly forbidden", 8152); sendQuest("X-Logging is also against the rules.", 8151); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Make sure you Remember that!."); }
